title: What to do when games has a problem?
body: When i entered a game with lux i start a bit late like usual but this time i had a problem with the game. Whenever i click somewhere on the map i only move to the opposing teams fountain I exited the game to tried and see if that would help but they said "You have been disconnected for prolonged inactivity. The game will now exit". I knew i would have to exit and re-enter the game so i did so. Then when i entered the game again it said the same thing why was that? My internet is good but they said that i trying to reconnect on the top of the screen. Need help. Can't be getting leave buster penalty for unknown problems that isn't caused by me. HELP ME!

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing input delay due to an unstable connection or packet loss.  I recommend running a [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to find out what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a list of steps to troubleshoot this.  Good luck!
